name: linux-diagnostics
description: Linux system diagnostics MCP server for monitoring and troubleshooting

setup_instructions.prerequisite: Ensure linux-mcp-server is installed via Homebrew: brew install linux-mcp-server
setup_instructions.step1: Add this configuration to ~/.config/opencode/opencode.json under the 'mcpServers' key
setup_instructions.step2: Restart OpenCode to load the new MCP server
setup_instructions.step3: Test the connection by asking OpenCode to check system resources
example_usage: Check current CPU and memory usage
Show running processes sorted by memory
Check disk space on all mounted filesystems
